QuestData.Title: The Gatewatcher's Talisman
QuestData.Description: Krik'thir, guardian of the gates to Azjol-Nerub, was not a traitor.$B$BHe fell in the War of the Spider defending our home from the Scourge.$B$BAs per his station, he was in possession of the key to the hidden empire. I'd like you to retrieve it so it may be returned to its people.
QuestData.LogDescription: Reclaimer A'zak in Azjol-Nerub wants you to retrieve the Gatewatcher's Talisman from Krik'thir the Gatewatcher.
QuestData.CompletionText: Has Krik'thir's spirit been released from the curse of undeath? What of the talisman?
QuestData.RewardText: Just as I suspected.$B$BMost of the empire has remained closed off since Krik'thir's final stand. Perhaps my people have already secured the depths and merely await release? Perhaps the faceless ones fester behind closed doors.$B$BOnly time will tell. The exposed upper reaches of Azjol-Nerub must first be cleansed of Arthas' taint.
